features: GENTLE, PH BALANCING OVERALL FEMININE & BODY WASH - Nonscents’ feminine care & exfoliating body wash gently cleanses & nourishes sensitive skin & intimate areas. This moisturizing body wash & face cleanser also soothes & relieves itching, dryness, redness, & irritation associated with eczema.

SOOTHING & MULTI-ACTING FORMULA - This organic face wash also helps prevent acne breakouts while delivering nourishing relief from a wide array of skin conditions. Unlike other facial cleansing products, this acne face wash can also be used as a feminine wash for women, leaving skin clean, balanced, refreshed, & healthy.

WITH SALICYLIC & AMINO ACIDS + NATURAL INGREDIENTS - Our hydrating cleanser & acne body wash is formulated with salicylic acid, which clears clogged pores & amino acids, which help boost hydration & moisture levels. This salicylic acid body wash & acne cleanser also contains aloe vera & cehami, which help soothe dry, irritated skin.

HYDRATING, MOISTURIZING, & NOURISHING - This acne face wash for women & men deeply hydrates, moisturizes, & replenishes natural moisture, preventing dryness & flakiness. Our gentle cleanser face wash replenishes your skin's vitality, leaving it younger, healthier, & more naturally vibrant.

PH BALANCED, UNSCENTED, & FRAGRANCE-FREE - Nonscents’ eczema body wash & daily facial cleanser is pH-balanced to mimic your skin’s natural pH levels, making it perfect for even the most sensitive skin. This salicylic acid face wash & foaming cleanser is also vegan, fragrance-free, sulfate-free, paraben-free, & cruelty-free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Makes my curls soft and defined!
reviews.reviewText: I love this curl cream, I have 2b/3a long curls and I pair it with gel and it makes my curls soft, frizz free, and most important, defined! It doesn’t leave any residue either. I have a severe fragrance sensitivity and this is the cheapest FF curl cream I could find so I love that it works great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for fine hair!
reviews.reviewText: My stylist loves it and so do I!It’s not sticky. It leaves my hair soft, not crunchy. And it helps my curls not to go frizzy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Helps with curls
reviews.reviewText: Helps form my curls. I have very thin hair however and need an additional product to keep the curls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My dermatologist told me I couldn't use scented products any longer because they caused me to have scalp keratosis (intense itching, scaling and bleeding cycle.) I had to use steroid liquid for a week and then repeat it to help some. I was really bummed about not being able to use my natural Aveda products for my curly, thick and frizzy tendancy hair. I was pleasantly surprised that this product did the same thing MUCH more affordably without the scent. I am impressed and will be a regular customer. My scalp and skin is super sensitive so I don't actually put any onto my scalp...but carefully apply just about 1/2 inch to an inch above my scalf and throughout the rest of my hair. I also combine this with unscented shampoo & conditioner and the Vanicare gel for separating hair and reducing frizz. I really like this company and am new to their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It makes my hair feel nice and soft and defines my curls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for frizzy hair.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because my hair is so frizzy when blow drying. After the first use I was very please that it was not oily. Use it every day after I shower!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Loved the product! Perfect for my ultra sensitive skin!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizing wash
reviews.reviewText: Very moisturizing for a non fragrant wash. Doesn't suds a lot if you like a body wash with lots of suds. Will definitely purchase again.
